pageContext.claim: “House Republicans support the President on Tariffs with Mexico all the way, & that makes any measure the President takes on the Border totally Veto proof. Why wouldn't you as Republicans support him when that will allow our President to make a better deal.” Thank you @GOPLeader
pageContext.analysis: Trump made up this quote by House Republican leader Kevin McCarthy, who had refused to say anything so definitive to reporters who asked whether Republicans would buck the president on his threatened tariffs on Mexico.  The closest approximation was from an interview that McCarthy gave Fox News: “No. No, we support this president. And why, when you're about to have a meeting – the secretary of State, Mike Pompeo, is meeting with Mexico tomorrow. We want to solve this crisis at the border – Why wouldn't you help them be as strong as they can be? Stand up with him, and you know what, if you give the president his strongest hand, you’ll never end up with tariffs and we'll have a border that is secure.”
